The role of leaders in building and maintaining trust, and protecting our reputation, was also the subject of an interactive session on Ethical Decision Making.

Welcome packs were delivered to the homes of those taking part ahead of the Forum. These included a book on Takedaâ€™s history and our Global Code of Conduct, as well as an invitation to take a virtual tour of Takeda locations.
